mdRecord.dcterms:title: roster of soldiers from Floyd County
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Post war document – roster of soldiers from Floyd County – list includes Companies A 24th Regiment, Companies B 42nd Regiment, Companies A, B, D, H & I of 54th Regiment, Stuart’s Horse Artillery, 21st Calvary. 10 original pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
